title: Chicken Pasta with Yummi Pops Nacho
ingredients: A family bag of Yummi Pops Nacho
instructions: Step 1: Place the previously cooked and shredded chicken in a bowl and mix it with the mayonnaise and milk.
Step 2: Now we can add the tomato, red onion, cilantro, and lemon juice and mix perfectly.
Step 3: Take our pasta or chicken salad to the refrigerator for half an hour.
Step 4: Serve it with Yummi Pops Nacho.
